learning_objectives.description: Calculate with the following: squares, square roots, cubes, cube roots, other powers and roots of numbers.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Includes recall of squares and their corresponding roots from 1 to 15, and recall of cubes and their corresponding roots of 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and 10, e.g.: Write down the value of √169. Work out 5² × ³√8.
